name: Fly me to the Sun
description:
“Fly me to the Sun” is a 2D platform game in which you play a tiny penguin who wakes up just before the start of a 6 month long night . However his tan is not finished and he really does not feel like staying in the dark night for so long. He  will have to escape the night and run, fly and float towards the sun while avoiding yetis, UFOs and any other obstacle that might cross his path. Who knows, perhaps our little friend will get to meet the sun in person and finally achieve his dream tan at the end of this quest? 

Controls 

Move with WASD 

Jump with W

Dash with M when the penguin icon is blue

Restart the level with Esc

Team

Cochon Viking  - Game Artist

Talamh - Sound Designer

Maureen Bastian - Game Designer 

Maxence Maire - Programmer

Ahmed Ben Amor - Producer

This game was developed in 48 hours as part of the Game Jam “Don’t stay in the dark”
